channel.title: Dragon claws special attack
channel.description:
Hey. I'm trying to add the Dragon claws special attack to my server at the moment, got the models right, special bar. But how do I add the x4 special attack? (There's no special at all atm). And in what file? Also, in the client, in what file do I add the special gfx(?)?
Thanks on advance.
EDIT: If someone even could post the x4 special and the look, that would be awesome!

item.title: Dragon claws special attack
item.dc:creator: @p00n99range p00n99range
item.description:
@p00n99range wrote:

[quote=“EpicPhail, post:5, topic:289098”]EDIT: Okay, finally. Got it working, just misunderstood the whole thing. -.-

Lock/delete this. :D[/quote]
How do you get 4 dragon claws specials. Please explain to me!

Read full topic

item.description:

EDIT: Okay, finally. Got it working, just misunderstood the whole thing. -.-

item.title: Dragon claws special attack
item.dc:creator: @DPreborn DPreborn
item.description:
@DPreborn wrote:

[quote=“s3x 4 u l1f3, post:3, topic:289098”]go to client.java
searth for your d claws id
and u will see something like this
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 50){(change 50 to 24 and it will be 4 specials :s
specialAtk(true, 50, 252, 0x426);
DCdown = 4;
DCDamg = true;
getHit(8);
usingSpecial = true;
}
then searth again and u will see this
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 50){(change 50 to 24 again)
specialAtkNPC(true, 50, 282, 2068);
DCdown = 4;
DCDamg = true;
npcDamage(8);
}[/quote]
His client didnt got the DCdown & DCDamg

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon claws special attack
item.dc:creator: @s3x_4_u_l1f3 s3x 4 u l1f3
item.description:
@s3x_4_u_l1f3 wrote:

go to client.java
searth for your d claws id
and u will see something like this
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 50){(change 50 to 24 and it will be 4 specials :s
specialAtk(true, 50, 252, 0x426);
DCdown = 4;
DCDamg = true;
getHit(8);
usingSpecial = true;
}
then searth again and u will see this
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 50){(change 50 to 24 again)
specialAtkNPC(true, 50, 282, 2068);
DCdown = 4;
DCDamg = true;
npcDamage(8);
}

Read full topic
